messages.subject: Kyo Tsuba Price Reduction
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all I will knock the tusba down $100 to $795 (price does not include shiping/insurance). If it doesn t go in the next few days I will then ppost it to other
messages.messageBody:
Hi all
I will knock the tusba down $100 to $795 (price does not include
shiping/insurance). If it doesn't go in the next few days I will then
ppost it to other outlets.
Also on the books I have up
I was wrong about the Token to Rekeishi- it does have a fair bit of
English in it- again they are published by the NTHK (NPO)
I will sell the whole set for $20 ppd in USA
I will also knock another $5 off the Chtisties and sell it for $15 ppd
in USA
I will give them a few days here before posting them to ebay.
email me with any questions kirk-becky@...
Thanks for the time and the bandwidth!
Kirk
